ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Pixie Strike oddity
ygData.msgSnippet: LOL, I think the majority of warriors hit auto-attack and then go get a beer.  It is nearly impossible to get them to stop attacking no matter how many
ygData.messageBody:
LOL, I think the majority of warriors hit auto-attack and then go get a
beer. It is nearly impossible to get them to stop attacking no matter how
many channels you try and use (tells/ooc/group/shout/guild)

-----Original Message-----
From: Cranfill, Wendy [mailto:Wendy_Cranfill@...]
Sent: Monday, March 05, 2001 2:37 PM
To: 'eqbards@yahoogroups.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Pixie Strike oddity


Have you ever tried to get them to stop attacking when a mob enrages? Have
you ever tried to get them to stop attacking before a heal? Have you ever
asked them what their INT is? *giggles*


> Why tanks don't understand that four
> tanks beating on something from the front is
> going to knock it off the cliff that's right behind it, I
> don't understand.
>
> Kenross Cantoforjado, 57 songs, Innoruuk
>
